app.name: SaveYourTime
app.tagline: A time management extension that helps you use your digital time more efficiently

warn.title: You've Run Out of Time!
warn.message: You've reached your daily time limit for this site. A great opportunity to redirect your attention to more important tasks!
warn.dailyStats: Today This site with total usage of {{totalTime}}

general.title: General Settings
general.strictMode: Strict Mode (Completely block sites when limit is exceeded)

timeLimit.title: Time Limiting
timeLimit.description: Set daily time limits for social media and other distracting sites. You'll be gently reminded when your limit is reached.

statistics.title: Usage Statistics
statistics.description: Track how much time you spend on different sites with visual graphs and manage your time better.

blocking.title: Smart Blocking
blocking.description: Choose between complete blocking or gentle reminders when time limits are exceeded. You can add extra time whenever needed.

steps.title: Add Sites
steps.description: Add websites you want to limit time on and set a daily time limit for each.

steps.title: Usage Tracking
steps.description: The extension quietly works in the background, monitoring the time you spend on specified sites.

steps.title: Limit Notification
steps.description: When your set time runs out, you'll see a gentle reminder before continuing.

steps.title: Flexible Control
steps.description: You can extend the time or remove all limits when needed. You're always in control.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Security
privacy.description: SaveYourTime stores all your data only locally in your browser and doesn't send any information to external servers. Your site usage data and settings are securely stored in your browser's "local storage" area.

privacy.title: SaveYourTime Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information about how we protect your data privacy

commitment.title: Privacy Commitment
commitment.description: At SaveYourTime, we value your privacy and data security. This extension does not send any data to external servers, and all your information is stored only in your own browser.

collected.title: Information Collected
collected.intro: SaveYourTime collects and records only the following information:
collected.timeSpent: The time you spend on websites you've specified
collected.dailyLimits: The daily time limits you've set
collected.storage: This information is stored only in your local browser and is necessary for the extension to function properly.

storage.title: Data Storage and Transmission
storage.noSend: Does not send any user data to external servers
storage.localStorage: Stores all data in your browser's local storage area
storage.offline: Can work even when you don't have an internet connection
storage.noTracking: Does not track any user identity or session information

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: As your data is stored only in your browser:
security.browserClear: It may be deleted if you clear your browser history or cache
security.uninstall: You can clear all recorded data from your browser when you uninstall the extension
security.access: Only your browser can access your data

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.intro: SaveYourTime requires the following browser permissions to function:
permissions.activeTab: Active tab access (to monitor time spent on sites you've specified)
permissions.storage: Local storage access (to save your settings and time information)
permissions.minimal: These permissions are the minimum required for the extension's core functionality.

openSource.title: Open Source Code
openSource.description: SaveYourTime is a fully open-source project. Our codebase is available for anyone to review on GitHub.
openSource.transparency: This transparency demonstrates our commitment to privacy. Anyone who wishes to review the code can verify that the extension truly doesn't send any data.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.intro: As a SaveYourTime user, you can:
rights.remove: Remove the extension from your browser settings at any time
rights.delete: Delete all recorded data from the extension settings
rights.modify: Modify any data you want from the extension settings

questions.title: Questions
questions.contact: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us through our GitHub project.
